name: Dice of Life (myruu, Sanziana Tudose, maiacaca)
name_original: Dice of Life (myruu, Sanziana Tudose, maiacaca)
description:
You go through multiple stages of life and face the seven deadly sins.  You try to control yourself in order to live a virtuous life. Will your efforts pay off?

Controls: Press SPACE to advance through story and play the mini-games.

A small game made by a pair of siblings and a best friend :> Enjoy!

artist instagrams: @um.que and @aurasiingerii
